nodes.text: The Office of Republic Justice was an organization that was affiliated with the Galactic Republic. During the Clone Wars, the senator Lavina Wren was imprisoned by the Republic inside a holding faciliy on the planet Coruscant after she announced that the Cularin system was to secede from the Republic. Wren's bodyguard Warlan Tosk subsequently broke the former senator out of the facility, and the pair fled from Coruscant in a stolen starship. In the aftermath of their escape, the Office of Republic Justice placed bounties of 35,000 and 20,000 on Wren and Tosk respectively.
